short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Das gesamte Wissen deines Unternehmens. Genau dann, wenn du es brauchst.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Context-Based Help. Instantly.

The fastest way to share and access internal knowledge within your company. Get support in one click. Wherever you need it.

Knowledge in a Box is a new kind of help tool that allows you to link your company's knowledge in just a few seconds. This way, existing files, and information are found in exactly the context in which they are needed. Your whole team stays up to date without having to search actively.

You donâ€™t have to worry about costly integrations. Just copy a link and paste it to the place where it is needed. This works with basically everything. If you have an URL, you can link it with this tool.

Key Features:
- Instantly access internal knowledge in one click.
- Link your company's knowledge effortlessly.
- No costly integrations required.
- Works seamlessly with URLs and virtually everything else.
